meanings.definition: To pass urine from the body.
meanings.sent1: The dog urinates on the fire hydrant.
meanings.sent2: She urinates in the bathroom every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat urinates in the litter box, showing good manners.
meanings.sent4: The rain urinates down from the sky, refreshing the earth.
meanings.sent5: He urinates with relief after holding it in for so long.

meanings.sent1: The baby urinates in the diaper.
meanings.sent2: The patient urinates into the sample cup for testing.
meanings.sent3: The fountain urinates water gracefully into the pond.
meanings.sent4: The burst pipe urinates water all over the floor.
meanings.sent5: The old faucet urinates drops of water slowly, needing repair.
